attributes.action: Ban Enduro, Motocross and other motorcycle sport from farmlands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to petition the Prime Minister to ban all forms of motorcycle and motorised crss country sports from Farmlands. The holding of Enduro Races and Motocross races on arable fields, with up to 150 contestants makes life in adjacent dwellings intolerable. This is an assault on our right to live peaceably inour house, and the right of all our neighbours. Apparently, no planning permission is required for this activity.
